content.stimulus_en: I haven't seen him (since) ________ last Monday.
How long have you lived here (for) ________?
We have been friends (since) ________ primary school.
They have been married (for) ________ a long time.
I have lived here (for) ________ ten years.
She has worked here (since) ________ 2010.
She has worked at the bank since she graduated.
We been have friends since we were children.
I haven't seen my best friend since last month.
They been have married for twenty-five years.
I have lived in this apartment for five years.
How have long you lived in this city?
